trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Gere uma colecção de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The DesignSurfaceManager class is designed to be a container of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> objects.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DesignSurfaceManager foi concebida para ser um contentor de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>objetos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>

trans-unit.source: It provides common services that handle event routing between designers, property windows, and other global objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornece serviços comuns que eventos de identificador de encaminhamento entre os estruturadores, propriedade windows e outros objetos global.

trans-unit.source: Using DesignSurfaceManager is optional, but it is recommended if you intend to have several designer windows.
trans-unit.target: A utilização de DesignSurfaceManager é opcional, mas é recomendado se pretender ter vários windows estruturador.

trans-unit.source: The DesignSurfaceManager class provides several design-time services automatically.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DesignSurfaceManager fornece vários serviços de tempo de criação automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: You can override each of these services by replacing them in the protected <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir cada um destes serviços, substituindo-los no protegida <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: To replace a service, override the constructor, call base, and make any changes through the protected <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir um serviço, o construtor de substituição, chamar base e efetue as alterações através de protegida <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: All services added to the service container that implement the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface are disposed when the design surface manager is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Todos os serviços adicionados ao contentor de serviço que implementa o <xref:System.IDisposable>interface são eliminado quando o Gestor de superfície do design é eliminado.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: The DesignSurfaceManager class provides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> interface as the default service.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DesignSurfaceManager fornece o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>interface como o serviço predefinido.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> provides a global eventing mechanism for designer events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>Fornece um mecanismo de eventos CCM global para eventos de estruturador.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>

trans-unit.source: With this mechanism, an application is informed when a designer becomes active.
trans-unit.target: Com este mecanismo, uma aplicação é informada quando um designer fica ativo.

trans-unit.source: The service provides a collection of designers and a single place where global objects, such as the Properties window, can monitor selection change events.
trans-unit.target: O serviço fornece uma coleção de designers e um único local onde a objetos globais, tais como a janela de propriedades, podem monitorizar seleção eventos de alteração.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A parent service provider.
trans-unit.target: Um fornecedor de serviço principal.

trans-unit.source: Service requests are forwarded to this provider if they cannot be resolved by the design surface manager.
trans-unit.target: Pedidos de serviço são reencaminhados para este fornecedor, se não pode ser resolvidos pelo Gestor de superfície do design.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the active designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estruturador de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDesignSurface property should be set by the designer's user interface whenever a designer becomes the active window.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ActiveDesignSurface deve ser definida pela interface de utilizador o estruturador sempre que um designer torna-se a janela ativa.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this property works with the default implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> interface to notify interested parties that a new designer is now active.
trans-unit.target: A implementação de predefinição desta propriedade funciona com a implementação predefinida do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>interface para notificar partes interessadas que um novo designer já está ativo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>

trans-unit.source: If you provide your own implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>, you should override this property to notify your service appropriately.
trans-unit.target: Se fornecer a suas próprias implementação <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>, deve ignorar esta propriedade para notificar o seu serviço adequadamente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to `null`, indicating that no designer is active.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade pode ser definida como `null`, que indica que nenhum estruturador está ativo.

trans-unit.source: The active designer.
trans-unit.target: O estruturador de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the currently active designer changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o estruturador está ativo é alterado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de uma superfície de desenho.

trans-unit.source: A new design surface instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova conceção superfície instância.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de uma superfície de desenho.

trans-unit.source: If you want to conveniently add additional per-designer services, use the `parentProvider` parameter to provide a service provider for this design surface.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender adicionar comodamente serviços por designer adicionais, utilize o `parentProvider` parâmetro para fornecer um fornecedor de serviços para esta superfície de desenho.

trans-unit.source: The CreateDesignSurface method creates a merged service provider that can satisfy service requests from both the given service provider as well as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> itself.
trans-unit.target: O método CreateDesignSurface cria um fornecedor de serviços intercalado que pode satisfazer os pedidos de serviço do fornecedor de serviço fornecido, bem como o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>propriamente dito.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>

trans-unit.source: The CreateDesignSurface method then passes this service provider into the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método CreateDesignSurface em seguida, passa este fornecedor de serviço para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A> returns the design surface, the CreateDesignSurface method tries to obtain the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>.
trans-unit.target: Após <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A>devolve a superfície do design, CreateDesignSurface método tenta obter <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: If it is present, and if it is the instance of the service that <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> provided by default, the CreateDesignSurface method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.DesignerCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: Se estiver presente, e se for a instância do serviço que <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>fornecido por predefinição, o método CreateDesignSurface gera o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.DesignerCreated>eventos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.DesignerCreated> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>

trans-unit.source: A parent service provider.
trans-unit.target: Um fornecedor de serviço principal.

trans-unit.source: A new merged service provider will be created that will first ask this provider for a service, and then delegate any failures to the design surface manager object.
trans-unit.target: Será possível criar um novo fornecedor de serviço intercalado que será primeiro solicitar a este fornecedor para um serviço e, em seguida, delegar eventuais falhas para o objeto de Gestor superfície do design.

trans-unit.source: This merged provider will be passed into the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore*> method.
trans-unit.target: Este fornecedor intercalado será transmitido a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore*>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore*>

trans-unit.source: A new design surface instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova conceção superfície instância.

trans-unit.source: parentProvider is .
trans-unit.target: parentProvideris .

trans-unit.source: Implementation that creates the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Implementação que cria a superfície do design.

trans-unit.source: The CreateDesignSurfaceCore method is called by both <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O método de CreateDesignSurfaceCore é chamado por ambos <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A>métodos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is the implementation that actually creates the design surface.
trans-unit.target: É a implementação que cria, na verdade, a superfície do design.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation just returns a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>.
trans-unit.target: A implementação predefinida devolve apenas uma nova <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>

trans-unit.source: You may override this method to provide a custom object that derives from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> class.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir este método para fornecer um objeto personalizado que derive da <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>classe.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>

trans-unit.source: A service provider to pass to the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um fornecedor de serviços para passar para a superfície do design.

trans-unit.source: This is either an instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"></xref> or an object that implements <xref:System.IServiceProvider>, and represents a merge between the service provider of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"></xref> class and an externally passed provider.
trans-unit.target: Esta é a uma instância de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"> </xref> ou um objeto que implementa <xref:System.IServiceProvider>e representa uma intercalação entre o fornecedor de serviços do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"> </xref> classe e um fornecedor externamente transmitido.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: A new design surface instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova conceção superfície instância.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a designer is created.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando é criado um estruturador.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a designer is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um designer é eliminado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of design surfaces.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de analisa de design.

trans-unit.source: The DesignSurfaces property is implemented directly on top of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>, so if you provide your own implementation of that service, this property uses your implementation.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DesignSurfaces está implementada diretamente de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>, pelo que o se fornecer a suas próprias implementação desse serviço, esta propriedade utiliza a sua implementação.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>

trans-unit.source: A collection of design surfaces that are currently hosted by the design surface manager.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de analisa de conceção que estão alojadas atualmente pelo Gestor de superfície do design.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The public Dispose method follows the standard <xref:System.IDisposable> pattern.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose público segue o padrão <xref:System.IDisposable>padrão.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method destroys the design surface manager.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método destroys o Gestor de superfície do design.

trans-unit.source: It also disposes the service container, which causes all services that implement <xref:System.IDisposable> to also be disposed.
trans-unit.target: -Disposes também o contentor de serviços, o que faz com que todos os serviços que implementam <xref:System.IDisposable>também seja eliminado.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal <xref:System.IDisposable> pattern.
trans-unit.target: A versão protegida deste método é `virtual` e de que respeita a normal <xref:System.IDisposable>padrão.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Porque <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>não tem qualquer código nativo para limpar, não tem um finalizador que chama <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>

trans-unit.source: If you need to call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>, you must add a finalizer yourself.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver de chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>, tem de adicionar um finalizador por si.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: The public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A> method follows the standard <xref:System.IDisposable> pattern.
trans-unit.target: O público <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>método segue o padrão <xref:System.IDisposable>padrão.</xref:System.IDisposable> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method destroys the design surface manager.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método destroys o Gestor de superfície do design.

trans-unit.source: It also disposes the service container, which causes all services that implement <xref:System.IDisposable> to also be disposed.
trans-unit.target: -Disposes também o contentor de serviços, o que faz com que todos os serviços que implementam <xref:System.IDisposable>também seja eliminado.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal <xref:System.IDisposable> pattern.
trans-unit.target: A versão protegida deste método é `virtual` e de que respeita a normal <xref:System.IDisposable>padrão.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls Dispose.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Porque <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>não tem qualquer código nativo para limpar, não tem um finalizador que chama Dispose.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>

trans-unit.source: If you need to call Dispose, you must add a finalizer yourself.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver de chamar Dispose, deve adicionar um finalizador.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público `Dispose()`método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>referências.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a service in the design surface manager’s service container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um serviço num contentor de serviços a estrutura superfície do gestor.

trans-unit.source: The GetService method forwards to any service provider that was given to the design surface manager at construction time.
trans-unit.target: O método GetService encaminha para qualquer fornecedor de serviço que foi introduzido para o Gestor de superfície do design durante a construção.

trans-unit.source: The service type to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de serviço a obter.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements, or is a derived class of, the given service type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the service does not exist in the service container.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa ou é uma classe derivada do tipo determinado serviço; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o serviço não existe no contentor de serviços.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the global selection changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a seleção a global é alterado.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the active designer's selection of component set changes.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é desencadeado quando a seleção do estruturador de Active Directory do componente definiu as alterações.

trans-unit.source: This is mapped through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> interface.
trans-unit.target: Isto é mapeado através de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the design surface manager's ServiceContainer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ServiceContainer o design superfície do gestor.

trans-unit.source: The design surface manager's ServiceContainer.
trans-unit.target: ServiceContainer o design superfície do gestor.
